item.title: Best Open-World Games Perfect For Backseat Gaming
item.description:
Summary

  • Far Cry 5 offers captivating action and exploration, making it engaging to watch.
  • Ghost of Tsushima's stunning world and combat make for a pleasing viewing experience.
  • Spider-Man 2, Yakuza 0, and Cyberpunk 2077 provide engaging stories and action for backseat gamers.

Games have progressed by leaps and bounds throughout the years, turning what were simple interactive experiences with limited pixels into one of the most immersive entertainment mediums that fans can get invested in. Even the simple act of watching a video game being played has become so engaging that many gamers don't even mind just looking at the action unfold on-screen.

Those who want to game with a friend or loved one will find the following open-world games to be perfect for them. They do a great job of keeping both the player and other viewers engaged, allowing them to witness how exploration, action, and story combine to form one harmonious loop.

Far Cry 5

The Action-Packed Gameplay And Fun Exploration Is Great To Witness

Far Cry 5
9 /10
21
7.8 /10
Released
March 27, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Powered by

One thing that fans can comfortably say about the Far Cry series is how captivating the action in these games can be. Far Cry 5 is no exception, and the endlessly spawning cultists will ensure that players will remain busy throughout their exploration of Hope County.

The cutscenes featuring the villains are riveting, and the organic exploration ensures that there's always something to do in the world. This ensures that backseat gamers will find a lot to love about witnessing the chaos of the game unfold.

Ghost Of Tsushima

The Beautiful Open World And Cinematic Combat Is Incredible

Ghost of Tsushima
9 /10
43
8.9 /10
Released
July 17, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language, Partial Nudity
Powered by

The beauty of Ghost of Tsushima 's world can't be stated enough. The amazing sights to behold on Tsushima Island are so breathtaking that most fans can be forgiven for getting lost in these grand vistas.

It helps that the combat makes for another fun side to the game when it kicks in. Though controlling it can make for a lot of fun, a great deal of enjoyment can also be had by simply watching Jin tear the Mongols apart as he strives to free his home from this barbaric invading force.

Marvel's Spider-Man 2

Swinging Around New York City And Beating Up Bad Guys Looks Great

8 Images
8 Images
Marvel's Spider-Man 2
9 /10
50
8.9 /10
Released
October 20, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen Due To Blood, Drug Reference, Mild Language, Violence
Powered by

The majority of gamers who enjoyed Marvel's Spider-Man and wanted more from its sequel were more than pleased by Miles and Peter's joint adventure. It was great to see the two heroes combine their efforts to fight massive threats, although the arrival of the symbiote adds a nasty edge to the proceedings.

For Marvel fans looking for a great adaptation of Venom, Marvel's Spider-Man 2 is simply a must-watch for how it does justice to this iconic villain. Though the game does have some issues regarding the pacing, the great combat and traversal will more than make up for it.

Yakuza 0

The Captivating Story, Incredible Heat Actions, And Goofy Side Content Is Perfect For Backseat Gamers

10 Images
10 Images
Yakuza 0
8.5 /10
Released
January 24, 2017

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood, Intense Violence, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Use of Alcohol
Powered by

Kiryu and Majima's origin stories help Yakuza 0 to be one of the best games in the series, making it perfect for those who just want to watch the narratives unfold. However, there are many sides to this game that are a crime to ignore along the way.

The hilarious substories and mini-games can be incredibly fun to watch, and some of the major side activities, like Real Estate Royale and Cabaret Club Czar, have story arcs of their own. All of this combines to make Yakuza 0 a meaty experience that even non-players can come to love.

Grand Theft Auto 5

A Chaotic Game With Fun Action Set-Pieces And Amazing Humor

5 Images
5 Images
Grand Theft Auto 5
9 /10
148
8.9 /10
Released
September 17, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Mature Humor, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Powered by

Any modern Rockstar game is perfect for a viewing experience, and Grand Theft Auto 5 is an ideal example to illustrate this. Countless fans love the fun that comes with controlling one of the three protagonists while playing through death-defying missions and attempting pulse-pounding heists, but having control isn't the only way to join in on the fun.

Despite the numerous instances of controversial writing present in the series, many still enjoy the crass humor and amazing performances featured throughout. The story is also very engaging, ensuring that even backseat gamers can get invested without ever needing to touch a controller.

Cyberpunk 2077

V's Journey To Save Their Body Makes For A Memorable Experience

6 Images
6 Images
Cyberpunk 2077
6 /10
112
8.9 /10
Released
December 10, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Powered by

After all the bugs were patched out, Cyberpunk 2077 staked a claim at being one of the greatest open-world RPGs of all time. The emotional story at the core of this experience involves V and their struggles to regain control of their body and mind before it's too late.

The cinematic story and excellent action ensure that Cyberpunk 2077 will leave a lasting impression on the majority of players, regardless of whether they played it or watched it unfold from the backseat. Phantom Liberty adds yet another excellent narrative arc for fans to uncover.

Red Dead Redemption 2

Arthur Morgan's Story Is Touching And Incredible To Witness

Red Dead Redemption 2
10 /10
168
9.5 /10
Released
October 26, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Powered by

The emotional story of Red Dead Redemption 2 is one of its biggest strengths. While the backseat viewing experience is best when Arthur has high Honor, a low Honor playthrough can also be entertaining in its own way.

The beauty of this world, the cinematic allure of the missions, and the depth of the game's characters all ensure that those invested will have a blast as they either play or watch Red Dead Redemption 2 . Arthur Morgan is an incredibly well-written character, and just getting to watch his journey unfold without ever controlling him can make for a truly unforgettable experience.

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

Geralt's Adventure Is A Tale For The Ages

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
9 /10
54
9.4 /10
Released
May 19, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Use of Alcohol, Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content
Powered by

Geralt's quest to find Ciri in The Witcher 3 makes for an easy hook that sets the stage for a grand and epic video game adventure. Everything from simple conversations to pulse-pounding action scenes has been developed with a ton of love and care, ensuring that both players and backseat gamers alike will have a blast in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt .

The two expansion packs also have compelling narratives of their own that enrich the backseat gaming experience. By the end of this long and massive adventure, the majority of those who experienced it will gain a newfound appreciation for the Witcher universe and CD Projekt Red.

item.title: Xbox Is Experiencing Major Server Problems Right Now
item.description:
Xbox says it is aware of "major outages" that are affecting some console users, which are preventing players from sending game invites, messages, and managing party groups. Thankfully, users on Xbox Series X/S and Xbox One can still jump into multiplayer and single-player titles, as the outages only appear to be affecting the consoles' party functionality.

The outage has come at the worst possible time for many gamers, as EA has just kicked off its second open beta weekend for Battlefield 6 . After a hugely successful first playtest last week, fans have been patiently waiting to jump back in for the second weekend. Although the outage isn't preventing players from jumping into the beta, those who were looking to party up with friends on Xbox Series X/S are likely going to encounter some issues until Microsoft addresses the problem. The good news is that the beta is available until August 17, so those who are looking to play with their Xbox friends will have plenty of time to check it out.

Xbox Reports 'Major Outages' for Some Users

On August 14, the official Xbox Support Twitter account confirmed that the studio is aware of users experiencing issues with creating or receiving party and game invites and messages. As spotted by VGC, the official Xbox support page has a total of five different services currently experiencing a "major outage." While it's not ideal, the good news is that these outages seem to be tied to the console's party services and are not preventing players from purchasing games on the Xbox Store, jumping into multiplayer matches, or streaming titles via Xbox Game Pass. Xbox says its engineers are currently working on restoring services for players.

Xbox did not explain what was causing the sudden outages, but it's likely nothing to be concerned about. With both PlayStation and Xbox dominating the gaming scene, occasional outages are to be expected. Those who have been around long enough will remember the huge PlayStation outage in 2011 that saw the service completely unavailable for nearly an entire month. This was during the days of the PlayStation 3, which was the beginning of multiplayer titles such as Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare , FIFA 11 , Killzone 3 , and many more. The outage sent shockwaves through the gaming world, as fans were left unable to sign in to PSN and access their favorite multiplayer titles.

Thankfully, this outage won't prevent fans from checking out the latest Xbox Game Pass titles. Last week, Xbox added Assassin's Creed Mirage to its lineup of Game Pass titles, with Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced following just a few days later, on August 12. If that wasn't enough, there's still plenty to look forward to for the rest of the month, with Gears of War: Reloaded joining Game Pass Ultimate and PC on August 26.

item.title: Monopoly GO: How to Get Low-Ranked Players in Tournaments
item.description:
Tournaments in Monopoly GO are a great way to win dice rolls, sticker packs, cash, and event tokens, but competing against high-level players can make it tough to rank well. If you've ever found yourself in a bracket full of ultra-competitive opponents (those who score thousands of points), you're not alone. Thankfully, there are a few clever strategies you can use to improve your chances of being matched with lower-ranked players in Monopoly GO tournaments.

How to Get Low-Ranked Players in Monopoly GO Tournaments

One of the most effective ways to avoid high-level players is to skip a couple of tournaments entirely . If you consistently rank in the top 3 of tournaments, the games matchmaking system will start grouping you with similarly competitive players.

By skipping the next tournament or two, you sort of give your tournament history a "cooldown," which can result in being placed in a more relaxed bracket when you return. This method is especially useful if the upcoming tournament has lackluster rewards and isnt worth the effort.

For this strategy, adjust your playstyle, whether by skipping, pacing yourself, or settling for lower ranks. This can reset the system and give you easier matchups in the future.

Another tested strategy is to join a tournament late , ideally during the final few hours, or even the last 10 to 15 minutes. Around this time, most of the high scorers have already secured their spots on the leaderboard, leaving the tournament pool with fewer active and competitive players. This can give you a huge advantage, especially if you use high dice multipliers to score a ton of points and climb up the ranks. You can easily secure top spots without the heavy grind this way.

Things To Keep in Mind Before Joining a Monopoly GO Tournament

Before you start playing any tournament, its worth considering how much the rewards matter to you . If theres a tournament with exclusive or rare prizes (like a new Shield), then it might be worth competing at full force, even if that means facing tougher opponents. However, if the rewards are average or not particularly helpful to your current progress, use that opportunity to either sit out or join near the end. This way, you can improve your placement in future brackets.

Remember that Monopoly GO s matchmaking system takes your past performance into account . If youre always in the top 5, the system may recognize your competitive behavior and place you in more aggressive brackets, with equally competitive players.
